snippet: Flappy Bird, Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze, and Dark Souls II are all examples of games in which difficulty is the appeal, and success is measured by delaying failure.
abstract: Stephen Totilo Critic's Notebook holds that new wave of incredibly difficult but very popular mobile games on market demonstrates public's appetite for challenge; offers games Flappy Bird, Dark Souls II and Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze as examples; says new games are hyper-examples of value of video games to present problems and invite solutions.
lead_paragraph: Flappy Bird, Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze, and Dark Souls II are all examples of games in which difficulty is the appeal, and success is measured by delaying failure.
